text: Sultan Alaeddin gelmeden bu meseleyi halletmemiz lazım.
english: this matter before Sultan Alaeddin arrives .

text: Şehzade Yiğit'in kellesi tez vakitte sultana götürülmeli.
english: Prince Yiğit's head must be brought to the sultan without delay.

text: (Saadettin) Bilesin, kapım sana her daim açık.
english: (Saadettin) Know that my door is always open to you. May

text: Emir Hazretleri, Ertuğrul abim Yiğit'i severdi.
english: His Highness the Emir loved my older brother Yiğit, Ertuğrul. If he said something that

text: Eğer sizi kıracak sözler ettiyse onu bağışlayasınız.

english: n't worry, Dündar. I know everything.
You are the future of the Kayı tribe. May
(Music - Thriller) I had to restrain myself

text: Kılıcımı çekip o iti ortadan ikiye bölmemek için kendimi zor tuttum Ertuğrul.
english: from drawing my sword and splitting that bastard in two, Ertuğrul. If it weren't for
my tribe, if it weren't for you... I
would have enlivened my tribe with his corpse.

text: Onun da vakti gelecek Tuğtekin Bey.
english: That time will come too, Mr. Tugtekin.

text: Er ya da geç onun da vakti gelecek.
english: Sooner or later, its time will come.

text: Köpek dişlerini geçirmeden gerçeği görmeyeceği belli.
english: clear he won't see the truth until he sinks his teeth in.

text: Tuğtekin Bey, senin de müsaaden olursa Yiğit'i bulmak için derhal yola çıkacağım.
english: Mr. Tuğtekin, if you allow me, I will set off immediately to find Yiğit.

text: Ne yapacaksın ağabey? Çocuğun canına mı kıyacaksın?
english: What are you going to do, big brother? Are you going to kill the child?

text: Gerekirse evet. Bu sadece bizim meselemiz değil, devletin ikbal meselesidir Ertuğrul.
english: Yes, if necessary. This isn't just our problem , it's a matter of the state's future, Ertuğrul.

text: Geyikli geldi beyim. Mühim bir haber getirdiğini söyler.
english: Geyikli has arrived, sir. He says he has brought important news. Let
Where is Geyikli located? It is located on the

text: Dumanlı Dağ'dadır. Üç Türkmen beyi gördük.
english: Misty Mountain. We saw three Turkmen chieftains. We

text: Takip ettik. Yolda Moğollar karşıladı onları.
english: followed them. The Mongols met them on the road.
They took the lords to the cave.

text: Emir Saadettin'in bahsettiği beyler olmalı. Yine haklı çıktı.
english: must be the gentlemen Emir Saadettin was referring to. He was right again.

text: Kaç kişiler, nöbetçiler nerede takip ediyor.
english: How many people are there, and where are the guards monitoring the situation? If we leave

text: Erkenden yola çıkarsak gece orada oluruz.
english: early, we'll be there by night. The

text: Dağ yolu çok sarp beyim. Gece atlarla yol alamayız.
english: mountain road is very steep, sir. We cannot travel by horse at night.

text: Geyikli doğru der Tuğtekin Bey'im. Biz hazırlığımızı yapalım.
english: Mr. Tuğtekin, you're absolutely right, Geyikli. Let 's get ready. We'll set off as soon as the

text: Doğan'la Bamsı'nın çadırına git, dinlen. Onlara da söyle hazır olsunlar.
english: Go to Doğan and Bamsı's tent and rest. Tell them to be ready, too. Yes sir.
Big brother, I want Yiğit alive. I'd

text: Bir de meseleyi onun ağzından duymak isterim.
english: also like to hear it from his perspective.

text: Şehzade Yiğit hakkında sultanın fermanı var Ertuğrul.
english: There is a decree from the Sultan regarding Prince Yiğit, Ertuğrul. If you

text: Ola ki zayıf davranacaksan sakın gelmeyesin.
english: 're going to act weak, then don't come.
We'll talk about this matter tonight.

text: Emir Saadettin, Oğuz Kağan'ın mührünü babamdan istemeseydi...
english: Emir Saadettin hadn't asked my father for Oğuz Kağan's seal...
...they would be alive now. While trying to

text: Beni öldürmek isterken babanı Ertuğrul'un kılıcına teslim etti.
english: kill me, he handed your father over to Ertuğrul's sword.

text: ...o çıyan sayesinde senin gibi gerçek bir erkeğimin olmasıdır Noyan.
english: thanks to that viper, I have a real man like you, Noyan. What about the
these things hadn't happened, you would have been his woman.

text: Selcan gibi o da ölecek Noyan.
english: Noyan will die, just like Selcan.
And peace be upon you, sir. Sir
Saadettin Köpek wouldn't get involved in such a big game just to get rid of me.

text: ...bu kadar büyük bir oyuna girmeyeceğini söyledi.
Ben de aynı şeyi düşünürüm beyim.
english: I think the same thing, sir.

text: Saadettin Köpek'in bundan başka bir hesabı daha olmalı.
english: Saadettin Köpek must have another plan besides this one.

text: Amma velakin şunu da unutmamak lazımdır ki...
english: But it is also important to remember that...
...the young man has grown up. He's grown up. What if he was so

text: Ben Yiğit'in hayatta kalmak için kendinden...
english: Yiğit did what was asked of him in order to survive,
But if those who have tainted his blood...
...have deceived him with tales of sultanate...

text: Maazallah bu hepimiz için büyük bir bela olur beyim.
english: God forbid, that would be a huge disaster for all of us, sir.

text: Peki ya Köpek? Onun hesabı nedir beyim?
english: What about the dog? What is his account, sir? She

text: Onu anamın otağında kendi ağzıyla söyledi.
english: said it herself in my mother's tent. Using

text: Üç tane basiretsiz Türkmen beyini kullanıp...

english: He has accomplished this as well.

text: Benim asıl korkum Köpek'in menzilinin Sultan Alaeddin olmasıdır.
english: My real fear is that the Dog's target will be Sultan Alaeddin.
You said the Sultan came with his soldiers. My lord, you cannot attempt

text: Sultana karşı böyle bir işe kalkışamaz beyim.
english: such a thing against the Sultan . The

text: Sultanın askerleri onu anca düşmanlarından korur Artuk Bey.
english: Sultan's soldiers can only protect him from his enemies, Artuk Bey.
He cannot protect himself from his own commander in Erzurum.
So what are you going to do, sir?
They'll be the ones to do whatever it takes.

text: Bana düşen, onların kurduğu tuzağa kendi ayaklarımla gitmek olacak.
english: My task will be to walk into the trap they set of my own accord.

text: Ölüm fermanını çıkartmışlar bile. Kardeşimi hain bellemişler.
english: They've already issued the death warrant. They branded my brother a traitor.
How can they believe that, Selcan?

text: Benim kardeşim bir hainin kışkırtmasıyla sultanlık hırsına düşmez.
english: My brother will not succumb to ambition for the sultanate at the instigation of a traitor . Don't

text: Merak etme Halime. Yiğit'e bir halel gelmeden hakikat ortaya çıkacak.
english: worry, Halime. The truth will come out without any harm coming to Yiğit. What if they kill my brother

text: Ya hakikat çıkmadan evvel kardeşimi katlederlerse?
Halime, gönlünün ateşi söyletir bunları sana.
english: Halime, the fire in your heart makes you say these things. Please don't

text: Allah'ın izniyle sağ salim kavuşacaksın kardeşine.
english: With God's permission, you will be reunited with your brother safe and sound.

text: Kardeşimin üzerinden nasıl oyunlar döner Ertuğrul?
english: What kind of games are you playing over my brother, Ertuğrul? I ca

text: Belli ki Köpek, gayeleri için Yiğit'i kullanmakta.
english: It's clear that Köpek is using Yiğit for his own purposes.

text: Noyan itini de avuçlarının arasına almış, oynamakta.
english: Noyan has that dog in his hands and is playing with it. While

text: Onlar bize bu tuzakları kurarken biz de boş durmayacağız.
english: they set these traps for us, we will not stand idly by.

text: (Ertuğrul) Yiğit'i o leş kargalarının elinden kurtaracağım.
english: I will rescue Yiğit from the clutches of those vultures. There's

text: Yiğit'ten tek bir iz bile yok Ertuğrul. Nasıl edeceksin?
english: not a trace of Yiğit, Ertuğrul. How will you do it?

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im, Hayme Ana'yla Gündoğdu Bey'im gelmektedir.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, Hayme Ana and Gündoğdu Bey are coming.

text: (Erkek 3) Hoş geldiniz beyim. Geçmiş olsun. Allah şifa versin.
english: (Male 3) Welcome, sir. Get well soon. May God grant you healing.
-(Hayme) Welcome. -(Dündar) It's good to be here, mother.
(Hayme) Thank God for bringing us together.
(Hayme) It's good to be here, son.
They said you were sick. I hope you're doing well.

text: Kim dedi onu? Kim dediyse yalan demiş kardeşim.
english: Who said that? Whoever said that was lying, brother. I'm as hard as a rock
. Thanks. My brother. Get well soon,
Thanks a lot, brother, much appreciated.
How is my daughter Halime? We had

text: Babamın vasiyet ettiği gibi adını Gündüz koyduk.
english: my father willed, we named him Gündüz.

text: Hey maşallah kardeşim. Hayırlı uğurlu olsun.
english: Wow, amazing brother! May it bring good fortune.
he grow up with both parents, God willing.

text: (Gündoğdu) Çok şükür. Gayrı otağımız evlatlarımızın sesiyle şenlenecek.
english: (Gündoğdu) Thank God. From now on, our tent will be filled with the joyful voices of our children.
Hopefully our children will grow up together, big brother.

text: Çok şükürler olsun. Torunumu artık bir kucağıma alayım.
english: I need to hold my grandchild in my arms now.

text: Çocuklar obaya dönerken Noyan pusu kurmuş.
english: Noyan has set an ambush as the children are returning to the camp.

text: Mani olamadım. Noyan, Dündar'la Yiğit'i kaçırdı.
english: I couldn't stop it. Noyan kidnapped Dündar and Yiğit.

text: Emir Saadettin, Dündar'ı Moğolların elinden kurtarıp bize verdi ana.
english: Emir Saadettin rescued Dündar from the Mongols and handed him over to us, mother.

text: Ben iyiyim ana. Sen merak buyurma.

english: good to be here, my daughter. Congratulations! May
he grow up with both parents, God willing. May
God protect him from evil. May
Almighty God bless you. May he
ennoble his lineage. May he grow taller. May He
keep you safe from harm. May God

text: (Hayme) Her iki cihanda seni aziz eylesin.
english: honor you (Hayme) in both worlds. May
God never deprive you of your father's mercy...

text: Seni bize bağışlayan rabbim inşallah Yiğit Alp'i de bağışlar.
english: God, who granted you to us, also grant Yiğit Alp's forgiveness.

text: İyilikle, sağlıkla bir an önce aramıza döner inşallah.
english: Hopefully, he will return to us soon in good health.

text: Allah izin verirse Yiğit'i çekip çıkaracağız bu beladan.
english: God willing, we will pull Yiğit out of this mess.
(Saadettin) Was Turgut Alp alone when he was captured?

text: (Noyan) Yalnızmış. Lakin mutlaka yanında birileri daha vardı.
english: (Noyan) was alone. But there must have been someone else with him. They have
already sent word to Ertuğrul. They do

text: Yarın sabah gün doğarken mağarama saldıracaklar.
english: They will attack my cave tomorrow morning at sunrise. So

text: Ee? Turgut Alp'i orada bulamayacaklar. O zaman ne olacak?
english: ? They won't find Turgut Alp there. So what will happen then?

text: Yiğit gibi Turgut'u da kurtarmak için daha büyük bir öfkeyle saldıracaklar.
english: They will attack with even greater fury to save Turgut, just as they did with Yiğit.

text: (Noyan) Onlara öyle bir tuzak kurdum ki...
english: (Noyan) I've set such a trap for them...
...that none of them will get out alive.

text: Ertuğrul'un ölmesi henüz işime gelmez Noyan.
english: Ertuğrul's death wouldn't suit me yet, Noyan.
What do you say, Saadettin? I tell

text: Sana Ertuğrul ölecek derim, sen işime gelmez dersin.
english: you Ertuğrul will die, and you say that doesn't suit you.

text: Senin bu sırlı hallerinden sıkıldım artık.
english: I'm tired of your secretive behavior.

text: Ne geçer aklından? Söyle de biz de bilelim.
english: What goes through your mind? Tell us so we can know too.
(Saadettin) We three want Ertuğrul's head. There is nothing

text: Bunda bir beis yoktur. Vakti geldiğinde Ertuğrul'u sana vereceğim.
english: wrong with that. I will give Ertuğrul to you when the time comes.

text: (Saadettin) Lakin her şeyin bir sırası vardır.
Evvela Kayılarla Dodurgalılar arasındaki ittifakı bozmak isterim.
english: First, I want to break the alliance between the Kayı and Dodurga tribes. So
? Tell me what's going through your mind. While

text: Askerlerin mağaraya giden Alpleri tuzağa düşürürken...
english: the soldiers are ambushing the Alps heading to the cave...
...you will abduct Gökçe Hatun from the tribe.

text: Ateşli oğlanın avradını ne yapacaksın ha?
english: What are you going to do with the wife of that hot guy?
Gökçe Hatun will bring Tuğtekin to you. Weren't you swearing oaths to

text: (Saadettin) Ertuğrul'un soyunu kurutacağım diye yeminler etmiyor muydun?

english: You will kill Tugtekin, who is of Ertugrul's blood.
You have to kill him so that...

text: ...ben de devlete sadık Sungur Tekin'i hak ettiği mevkie getireyim.
english: ...I can bring Sungur Tekin, who is loyal to the state, to the position he deserves.

text: Turgut bizi bu bölgede bekliyor olacak.
english: Turgut will be waiting for us in this area.

text: Mağara burada. Biz Turgut'tan nöbetçilerin nerede olduklarını...
english: The cave is here. We will attack the cave after we find out from Turgut where the guards are...

text: ...aşağı yukarı kaç kişi olduklarını öğrendikten sonra mağaraya saldıracağız.
Atları burada bırakalım. Yaya gitmemiz daha akıllıca olur.
english: Let's leave the horses here. It would be wiser for us to go on foot. If

text: Noyan geldiğimizi fark ederse Yiğit Alp'in yüzünü bir daha göremeyiz.
english: Noyan notices we've arrived, we'll never see Yiğit Alp's face again.

text: Onu elinden sağ salim almalıyız ağabey.
english: We have to get him back from them safe and sound, brother.

text: Yiğit'i sağ salim ele geçirsek ne olacak Ertuğrul? Onu obaya getiremeyiz.
english: What will happen if we capture Yiğit safe and sound, Ertuğrul? We can't bring him to the camp.

text: Emir Saadettin'e verirsek, onu orada infaz edecektir.
english: If we give the order to Saadettin, he will execute him there.
Whatever needs to be done should be done there.

text: Sen ne dersin ağabey? Onu oracıkta öldürmekten mi bahsedersin?
english: What do you say, big brother? Are you talking about killing him right there and then? The

text: Sultanın fermanı ortada Ertuğrul. Görüldüğü yerde infaz edilecek.
english: Sultan's decree is right there, Ertuğrul. He will be executed on sight. There's

text: Gayrı bundan geri dönüş yok. Hiçbirimiz için yoktur.
english: no turning back now. It doesn't exist for any of us.

text: Obamızı, sultanlığını ilan eden ahmak bir çocuk için tehlikeye atamayız.
english: We cannot jeopardize our community for the sake of a foolish child who has declared himself sultan.

text: Biz oraya sadece Yiğit'i kurtarmaya değil, Köpek'in oyununu bozmaya da gideriz.
english: We're going there not only to rescue Yiğit, but also to foil Köpek's plan. You keep

text: Hâlâ aynı şeyleri söyleyip durursun Ertuğrul.
english: saying the same things over and over, Ertuğrul. You told us how
Yiğit and his father were mere pawns

text: ...Eyyubilerin de elinde nasıl oyuncak olduğunu sen bize anlattın.
english: in the hands of both the Templars and the Ayyubids . You've

text: Bunca şeyi görüp yaşadın. Hâlâ o çocuğu kurtarmak mı istersin?
english: seen and experienced so much. Do you still want to save that child?
This kid has declared himself king. He wanted both

text: Anamın da Tuğtekin'in de kendisine itaat etmesini istedi.
english: my mother and Tugtekin to obey him. Can't you
see they're using him, brother? What difference will

text: Sultan Alaeddin çoktan ordusunu alıp yola çıktı.
english: Sultan Alaeddin had already gathered his army and set out. He's

text: Şimdilik üç oba isyana tevessül etti.
english: So far, three tribes have attempted to revolt.

text: Ardından belki diğer obalar isyana katılacak.
english: Then perhaps other tribes will join the rebellion.

text: Yiğit'in yaşadığı her dakika, her gün devlete tehdit demektir.
english: Every minute, every day that Yiğit lives, represents a threat to the state.

text: Sakın ola ki Halime Sultan'ın kardeşi diye...
english: Please, my brother, don't lead us down paths with uncertain outcomes just because he's Halime Sultan's brother.

text: ...bizi sonu belli olmayan yollara sürüklemeyesin kardeşim.

english: (Hayme) One problem ends only for another to begin. As if that weren't enough, you

text: Bu yetmezmiş gibi bir de birbirinize düşersiniz.
Yiğit sadece devlet için değil, bizim için de bir tehdittir.
english: Yiğit is a threat not only to the state, but also to us.

text: Hayırlısıyla şu baskını yapıp inini başına geçirin Noyan'ın.
english: Hopefully, you'll carry out this raid and destroy Noyan's lair.

text: (Hayme) Şehzade Yiğit'e gelince. Madem Köpek'e güvenmezsin...
english: As for Prince Yiğit (Hayme)... Since you don't trust the Dog...

text: ...o vakit yıllardır uğruna savaştığımız sultanımıza teslim edersin.
english: ...then you should hand him over to our Sultan, for whom we have been fighting for years. From now on,
Welcome, Boğaç Alp. We're going on

text: Sabah Alplerle beraber bir yere baskına gideceğiz.
english: a raid with the Alps tomorrow morning .

text: Lakin beyler nereye gideceğimizi sır gibi saklarlar.
english: But gentlemen, they keep our destination a secret.

text: Ben nereye gideceğinizi bilirim, lakin sen onlarla baskına gitmeyeceksin.
english: I know where you're going, but you won't be going on a raid with them.
What do you command me to do, Your Highness?

text: Allah'ın izniyle bu işi alnımızın akıyla bitirdiğimde Konya'ya gideceğim.
english: God willing, when I finish this job successfully, I will go to Konya. I would like

text: Senin de benimle gelmeni ve mahiyetime girmeni isterim.
english: you to come with me and become part of my inner circle.

text: Siz nasıl münasip görürseniz Emir Hazretleri.
english: As you see fit, Your Highness.

text: O halde Gökçe Hatun'u Noyan'a vereceksin.
english: Then you will give Gökçe Hatun to Noyan.

text: Noyan da senin gibi kimin yanında cenk edeceğini artık bilir.
english: Noyan, like you, now knows who he'll be fighting alongside.

text: O da senin gibi devletin sadık bir hizmetkârı olmayı seçmiştir.
english: He, like you, has chosen to be a loyal servant of the state.
I am at your service, Your Highness.
What do you want me to do?

text: ...bu gece bir fırsatını bulup Tuğtekin'in otağına gireceksin.
english: ...you'll find an opportunity tonight to enter Tugtekin's tent.
You will set off before sunrise, my sultan.

text: Sadık beyleriniz sizi kutlu ordunuza götürecekler.
english: Your loyal lords will lead you to your glorious army.

text: Askerlerim de size eşlik edecekler sultanım.
english: My soldiers will also accompany you, my sultan.

text: Uğrunuzda ölmeye hazır nice yiğitler, sizi görmek için sabırsızlanırlar sultanım.
english: Many valiant warriors, ready to die for you, eagerly await your arrival, my Sultan.
... you yourself will take his head, my Sultan. You will not let
your late father's blood be spilled in vain .

text: Kefersud'dan Kaya Bey, Harput'tan Kutlu Bey...
english: Kaya Bey from Kefersud and Kutlu Bey from Harput...

text: ...ordunuza katılmak için Alpleriyle yola çıkmıştır sultanım.
english: ...have set out with their Alps to join your army, my Sultan.
Your presence has added strength to our power, my sultan. May
God never take you away from us. Any

text: Sultan Alaeddin'den bir haber var mı Noyan?

english: We heard that he set out from Konya with his army.
Now is the time for revenge for all of us.

text: Yarın Yiğit Alp'i kurtarıp Moğol'un köküne kıran getireceğiz.
english: Tomorrow we will rescue Yiğit Alp and wipe out the Mongols.

text: Sonra da gönül rahatlığıyla Bizans sınırına göç edeceğiz inşallah.
english: Then, God willing, we will migrate to the Byzantine border with peace of mind.

text: Ahval ne kadar çetin olsa da göç vakti gelmiştir.
english: However difficult the circumstances, the time to migrate has come. No matter

text: Ahval ne kadar çetin olursa olsun...
english: how difficult the circumstances, there is

text: ...biz inananlar için her daim bir çıkar yol vardır.
english: always a way out for us believers . Let
us keep our hope alive, brothers and sisters. The

text: Göç edeceğimiz yer saray olmayacak kardeşler.
english: place we're moving to won't be a palace, brothers. Even

text: Orada da türlü belalar peşimizi bırakmayacaktır.
english: there, all sorts of troubles will continue to follow us. Is there any palace better than the heartfelt

text: Kardeş yaratanın aşkı oldukça gönülden âlâ saray mı vardır?
english: love of the Creator, my brother ?
Banı Çiçek Hatun. Enjoy your meal,
job, sister! Health to your hands.
Thank you, Bamsi Beyrek. Thank you,

text: Yarabbi bize verdiğin nimetler için sana şükürler olsun.
english: Lord, for the blessings you have bestowed upon us .
(Dervish) Just as you feed us, feed the hungry...
...the helpless, the orphans, and the homeless as well. O Lord, do not

text: Bizi açlıkla sınayıp, toklukla imtihan etme yarabbi.
english: test us with hunger, nor with satiety . Make us among those who appreciate the
blessings You have bestowed upon us .

text: Ve her daim sana şükredenlerden kıl. Âmin.
english: And make me one of those who are always grateful to You. Amine.
your mind wander off to, brother?

text: Sana derim Bamsı kardeş. Ne düşünürsün öyle?
english: I'm telling you, brother Bamsi. What do you think?
Brother, I used to think about the beauty of gratitude. A
person who knows how to be grateful knows himself. He who knows
himself knows his Lord, brother. He who knows

text: Rabbini bilen acizliğini görür, acizliğini bilir.
english: his Lord sees his own weakness , and knows his own helplessness.

text: Hal böyleyken her daim Allah'ın verdiği nimetlere şükreder olur kardeş.
english: Therefore, my brother should always be grateful for the blessings God has given him.

text: Halime Sultan evladını doğurduğunda heyecanını gördüm.
english: I saw Halime Sultan's excitement when she gave birth to her child.
Ertuğrul's joy when he held his son in his arms .
Ertuğrul Bey has been like an older brother to me.

text: Halime Sultan da gayrı kardeşim olmuştur.
english: Halime Sultan has also become my sister.
His children have become more than my own children.

text: Bana sevmeyi de sevilmeyi de sen öğrettin demiştin.
english: me both how to love and how to be loved .
You taught me how to love, my lord. You taught me
not to be a foolish child...
...even if I'm worth less than the dust on your boot in the eyes that once looked at me with love...

text: ...gayrı çizmenin tozu kadar değerim olmasa da...

english: ...I will love you until my last breath.
If it's my destiny to love and not be loved in return...
Even if you cannot give me a child...
I feel your pain in my heart, Halime. I

text: Ant olsun, kardeşini ne Noyan'a ne de Köpek'e yem etmeyeceğim.
english: swear, I will not let your brother be devoured by either Noyan or Köpek. I will destroy

text: Noyan'ın inini yerle bir edip onu kurtaracağım.
english: Noyan's lair and rescue him. I have
absolutely no doubt about that, Ertuğrul. I remember the day you

text: Bizi kurtarıp Tapınakçıları helak ettiğin gün dün gibi aklımda.
english: saved us and destroyed the Templars as if it were yesterday.
Why did you go quiet, Halime?

text: Bu sefer farklı. Kardeşimi hain belleyenler...
english: This time it's different. Those who consider my brother a traitor...

text: ...aç kurt gibi onun etini, kanını isterler.
english: ...like ravenous wolves, they crave his flesh and blood.
...wanted to become sultan of his own free will?

text: Sen ne dersin Ertuğrul? Yiğit'in böyle bir gaflete düşeceğine nasıl ihtimal verirsin?
english: What do you say, Ertuğrul? How could you possibly think Yiğit would make such a mistake? Let's

text: Dua edelim de böyle bir gaflete düşmemiş olsun.
english: pray that he hasn't fallen into such a folly.

text: Yoksa onu kendi ellerimle sultana teslim etmem gerek.
english: Otherwise, I will have to hand him over to the sultan with my own hands.

text: Eğer böyle bir şey ettiyse onun canını almak benim boynumun borcudur.
english: If he did such a thing, it is my duty to take his life.

text: At tökezliyor beyim. Belli ki canı yanar. Gidemiyor.
english: horse is stumbling, sir. It's clear that he's hurting. He can't go. What's wrong,
Boğaç? What's wrong with the animal?

text: Beyim, obadan çıkarken hiçbir şeyi yoktu. Lakin şimdi bir gariplik var.
english: My lord had nothing when he left the camp. But now something is strange.

text: Boğaç, sen obaya geri dön. Cenkte bize yük olma.
english: Bogac, go back to the camp. Don't be a burden to us in battle. Yes sir

text: Artuk Bey'im, Gündoğdu Bey'imin kolu için benden hazırlamamı istediğin merhem. Buyur.
english: Mr. Artuk, this is the ointment you asked me to prepare for Mr. Gündoğdu's arm . Be my guest.

text: Derviş İshak, Allah senden bin kere razı olsun.
english: Dervish Ishak, may God be pleased with you a thousand times over.

text: Çok cefamı çektin. Dualarını bizden esirgemeyesin.
english: You've put up with a lot of my troubles. Please don't withhold your prayers from us.
Not at all, Mr. Gündoğdu. My

text: Derdi de dermanı da veren Yüce Rabbim.
english: Lord, the Almighty, is the one who gives both the ailment and the cure.
Sir, the boil has almost dried up. The
chief physician in Erzurum has demonstrated his skill.

text: E gücüm de neredeyse yerine geldi.
english: And my strength has almost returned.

text: Tez vakitte kardeşlerimle cenkte olmak isterim.
english: I wish to be in battle with my brothers as soon as possible. Do

text: Merak etmeyesin beyim. Tez vakitte o dediğin olacak inşallah.
english: n't worry, sir. Hopefully, what you said will happen soon.

text: Lakin ben Ertuğrul’un da, obanın da ahvalini pek iyi görmem.
english: However, I don't see Ertuğrul or the tribe doing very well. Rest

text: Ertuğrul Bey’im daha evvel nasıl muvaffak olduysa…

english: ...he will do his best in this matter as well.

text: Muhakkak Artuk Bey. Lakin bu kez devletin bekası tehlikededir.
english: Certainly, Mr. Artuk. But this time, the survival of the state is at stake.
Emir Saadettin's arrival at the encampment...

text: …Sultan Alaeddin’in bundan haberinin olması, ordularını toplaması…
english: ...Sultan Alaeddin learning of this , gathering his armies...
...setting out on his journey. These are not good signs.
Moreover, he considered Emir Saadettin his enemy more than his brother Noyan

text: …Emir Saadettin’i kendine düşman bellemiştir. Bu hiç iyi değildir.
english: . This is not good at all.
Geyikli, are you sure this is it?

text: Turgut kardeş bizi burada bekleyeceğini söylediydi.
english: Turgut said he would wait for us here. Sir
Or is it... what comes to your mind?

text: Nedir kardeş aklına gelen? Anlat hepsini.
english: What's on your mind, brother? Tell me everything.
Turgut is in their hands, older brother.
He said he would wait for us here. If

text: Bir aksilik olmasaydı şimdi çoktan çıkardı ortaya.
english: something hadn't gone wrong, it would have surfaced by now.

text: Kaybedecek vakit yoktur o hâl. Tez yola düşelim.
english: There's no time to lose in that situation. Let 's set off quickly. If
Noyan captured Turgut… it means he knows about
Our loved ones will return safe and sound, Halime.
Hopefully they will bring Yiğit Alp as well.

text: Artık huzur bulasınız, evladınızla mutlu olasınız isterim.
english: peace and happiness with your child .
Hopefully, all together. There have been many times

text: Geçmişte sana kötü davrandığım çok oldu.
english: in the past when I treated you badly .
I hurt her heart deeply too.

text: Gayrı benim bir değil, üç kardeşim vardır.
english: not one, but three siblings. May
God reunite us with our loved ones, Gökçe. May God grant that they be
freed from war and captivity, and return

text: …bizlerin yanına sağ salim gelmelerini nasip etsin.
Demek avlanmaya çıktın ha ateşli oğlan?
english: So you went hunting, huh, fiery boy?

text: Bilmezsin ki ava giderken av olup, avradından olacaksın.
english: You never know that while you're out hunting , you might become the hunted and lose your wife.
The cave is a little further on. Both
Turgut and Yiğit are in their hands. The

text: En ufak bir hatamız canlarına mâl olur.
english: slightest mistake we make could cost them their lives. Don't worry,

text: Onları oradan sağ salim çıkarmalıyız ağabey.
english: We have to get them out of there safe and sound, brother. That is

text: Hele bir sağ salim mağaraya varalım.
english: Let's just get to the cave safely first. May
Come on, brothers. In the name of Allah.

text: …bu soysuzlar sürüsüne sultanlık edeceksin, öyle mi?
english: … you’ll rule over this horde of scoundrels , will you? Is
Don't test my patience, Turgut Alp. It turns out

text: Sen de baban gibi zayıf, korkak ve zavallıymışsın meğer.
english: you're just as weak, cowardly, and pathetic as your father.

text: Seni Tapınakçıların elinden kurtardığım güne lanet olsun Yiğit.
english: rescued you from the Templars, Brave One.

text: Bunu, bana biat eden Alplerimin önünde kendi ellerimle idam edeceğim.
english: this with my own hands in front of my Alps who have pledged allegiance to me .

text: Hemen yola çıkıp, tez vakitte ordumun başına geçmek isterim.
english: I want to leave immediately and take command of my army as soon as possible.
n't withhold your help from him.
Grant him victory on this path. Give him the strength

text: Kardeşimi kurtarması için ona güç ver.

english: Do you have permission, Gökçe Hatun?

text: Ertuğrul Bey ile Tuğtekin Bey birbirlerine girdiler. Zor ayırdık.
english: Ertuğrul Bey and Tuğtekin Bey got into a fight. We had a hard time separating them.
What do you say, Boğaç Alp?
We didn't understand either, Gökçe Hatun.
He went to Duru Hatun's grave.
God forbid, mother. Be my guest .

text: Yatmaktan usandım ana. Selcan’la azıcık yürüyelim dedik.
english: I'm tired of lying down, Mom. Selcan and I decided to take a little walk.

text: Hayırdır? Dertli gördüm seni. Buyur, geç otur.
english: What's wrong? I saw you looking troubled. Please, sit down.

text: Dün gece Ertuğrul ile Sungur’un hâli beni pek üzdü oğul.
english: Last night, seeing Ertuğrul and Sungur upset me greatly, son.

text: O halde en belalı düşmanımızın inini asmaya gittiler.
english: So they went to hang the lair of our most troublesome enemy. I couldn't sleep a wink all night

text: Merak etmeyesin ana. Sağ salim döneceklerdir.
english: n't worry, Mom. They will return safe and sound. And

text: Hem sen de iyi bilirsin ki Ertuğrul her daim bildiğini okuyacak.
english: you know very well that Ertuğrul will always do what he thinks is right.
Yesterday with you, today with Sungur Tekin. I

text: Her daim evlatlarımın arasında ikilik görürüm.
english: always see division among my children . So
we get rid of this problem…
what kind of problem will find us next?

text: Ertuğrul gerekirse toyun kararına bile sırtını döneceğini belli etti.
english: Ertuğrul made it clear that he would even turn his back on the council's decision if necessary. If necessary,

text: İcap ederse tek başına Bizans sınırlarına gidecektir.
english: he will go to the Byzantine borders alone. Let's be honest and

text: Gayrı Kayılar için ayrılık vakti gelmiştir.
english: time has come for the Kayı tribe to part ways. If necessary,

text: İcap ederse Ertuğrul tek başına yola düşer.
Nice Alp de onunla birlikte o yola düşecektir.
english: Nice Alp will also set off on that journey with him. You'd better

text: Sen de buna kendini hazırlasan iyi edersin.
Peki, ya toyda Bizans’a gitme kararı çıkarsa…
english: But what if the decision is made at the wedding to go to Byzantium…

text: Ben her daim toyun kararına saygı duydum.
english: I have always respected the decision of the youth.

text: Lakin toydan böyle bir karar çıkacağını hiç zannetmem.
english: But I highly doubt such a decision will come from a young person .

text: Ertuğrul bu yola tek başına düşecektir.
english: Ertuğrul will embark on this journey alone.

text: Nice Alp’imizi de kendiyle birlikte sürükleyecektir.
english: Nice will drag our Alps along with it. "

text: Kayı’nın gücü sizsiniz oğul, geleceği de.
english: You are the strength of Kayı, my son, and also its future." I'm willing to do anything to

text: Dördünüzü bir arada tutmak için her şeyi yapmaya hazırım.
english: keep the four of you together .
We'll go to the wedding and elect a new leader.

text: Toyda kim bey seçilirse, diğerleri de ona uyar.
english: Whoever is chosen as the leader at the wedding, the others will follow him.
Mom, don't think about these things right now.
Water flows and finds its own path.
go for a walk. Let's visit my uncle's and aunt

text: Dayımla Duru yengemin mezarını ziyaret edip dua edelim.

english: (Noyan) Don't waste your breath, hot woman. The

text: Ateşli oğlan mağaraya beni öldürmeye gitti.
english: hot-tempered boy went into the cave to kill me.

text: Lakin o da senin gibi av olacak.
english: But he too will become prey, just like you.
What are you talking about? The

text: Seni son gördüğümde zavallı bir âşık gibi Ertuğrul’a yalvarmaktaydın.
english: last time I saw you, you were begging Ertuğrul like a pathetic lover .

text: Ne işin var burada Gökçe? Her tarafımız düşman kaynarken…
english: What are you doing here, Gökçe? With enemies swarming all around us
… what can you do here? I couldn't bear to see

text: Hırslı hatunmuşsun. Ne yaptın ettin bir bey hatunu olmayı başardın.
english: You're an ambitious woman. You somehow managed to become a gentleman's wife. You've completely swept

text: Bizim ateşli oğlanın aklını başından almışsın.
english: our hot boy off his feet . Thanks to

text: Senin sayende ben de onun kellesini alacağım.
english: you, I'll get his head too.
What do you want from me? I don't want

text: Seni değil, ateşli oğlanı isterim, erini.
english: you, I want the fiery boy, your husband.

text: Bakalım o seni ne kadar ister?
english: Let's see how much he/she wants you? Ah!

text: Ağabeylerimle olmalıydım ana. Onlarla cenk etmeliydim.
english: I should have been with my brothers, Mom. I had to fight them.

text: Ertuğrul ağabeyim hata eder. Yiğit hepimize ihanet etti.
english: My older brother Ertuğrul is making a mistake. Yiğit betrayed us all.

text: Sungur Tekin ağabeyimin dediği gibi o artık hain.
english: As my older brother Sungur Tekin said, he is now a traitor. He betrayed not
only us, but also the state

text: …sultanımıza da ihanet etti. Onu hayatım boyunca affetmeyeceğim.
english: … and our sultan. I will never forgive him for the rest of my life.
What will my mother say, husband?

text: İki oba ayrılmasın diye uğraşır. Lakin kardeşim varken bu çok zor olacak.
english: He tries to prevent the two tribes from separating. But that will be very difficult with my brother around.
They hid them behind the trees, sir.
Mom, this place isn't safe. We need to

text: Bir an evvel obaya dönmemiz icap eder.
english: return to the camp as soon as possible .

text: Dündar, çabuk obaya git. Alpleri topla gel.
english: Dündar, go to the camp quickly. Gather the Alps and bring them here.
you think this is Noyan's doing?

text: Bu deliliği başka kim yapacak ana?
english: Who else would do something so crazy, mother?

text: Hele, hele. Gene karşılaştık Selcan Hatun.
english: Oh dear, oh dear. We met again, Selcan Hatun.
Leave my brother alone. As always,
Oh dear, oh dear. Everyone who

text: (Sungur Tekin) Her yere bakın. Bir iz bırakmış olabilirler.
english: (Sungur Tekin) Look everywhere. They might have left a trace.

text: Dikkat edin. Başka tuzak da kurmuş olabilirler.
english: Pay attention. They might have set another trap as well. That dog Noyan didn't have
the courage to face the fight .
you were loitering in your den…
